text: I get along with guys most of my friends are guys. It's easier to trust men sometimes. I only have a few close girlfriends that I trust.
author: Paris Hilton

text: I was surrounded by strong women so it had never even occurred to me that women were anything other than equal to men.
author: David Bailey

text: A good boss makes his men realize they have more ability than they think they have so that they consistently do better work than they thought they could.
author: Charles Erwin Wilson

text: Although I do wrong, I do not the wrongs that I am charged with doing the wrong that I do is through the frailty of human nature, like other men. No man lives without fault.
author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

text: The happiness and misery of men depend no less on temper than fortune.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
